content: crocheted bag in drops bomull-lin the piece is worked bottom up with treble crochets in zig-zag pattern #ivorytwistbag pattern l-176 yarn group c or a + a **size** circumference approx 56 cm height approx 35 cm from mid-bottom to highest point **yarn** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio 150 g colour 03 sand 50 g colour 02 off white **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 10 5 row in height on hook size 3 5 mm= 10 x 10 cm
